description:
Latin honours students will write a thesis of 16,000 words on a topic agreed with their advisor after consultation. The thesis will incorporate evidence of substantial translation and analysis. This course is only for full-time and part-time students commencing in Semester 2 (enrolling in two consecutive semesters). 
Full-time and part-time students commencing in Semester 1, enrol in LATN6311 (for two consecutive semesters).
